name: BLEAK
blurb: Want new? Explore new races, governments, religions and more in this dark steampunk style platformer!\nPC/Mac/Linux

rewards.reward:
SUPER SOURCER TIER:
• You'll receive an e-mail containing:
  - A personal "Thank You" from all of us!
  - An exclusive PDF packet of BLEAK concept art.
BEARDSTAFF BACKER TIER:\r\n\u2022 Everything from the above tier.\r\n+ An early release digital copy of BLEAK on PC MAC or LINUX!

SYLVAN SAVIOR TIER:\r\nThe Pinnacle Package which includes: \r\nx1 Personal thank you e-mail from all of us. x1 Exclusive PDF packet of BLEAK concept art. x1 Early release digital copy of BLEAK on PC MAC or LINUX. x1 High quality digital copy of the 50 Song BLEAK Soundtrack by Or Nothing.
RED REMEDY TIER:\r\nThe Pinnacle Package (See $25 tier for specific contents)\r\n\u2022 Development Forum Access: where you have a direct line to the development team!

TREMENDOUS TWITCH TIER:
The Pinnacle Package (See $25 tier for specific contents)
• Development Forum Access
• An 11 x 17" BLEAK Promo Poster signed by the whole development team and mailed to your house!

PREMIER PRESENCE TIER:
The Pinnacle Package (See $25 tier for specific contents) • Development Forum Access
• Your name will be added to the special thanks section of our credits as well as immortalized in-game on a grave stone in the "Hero's Graveyard" located in Fallen.
• A team signed 11 x 17" BLEAK promo poster!

CHOSEN TIER:
The Pinnacle Package (See $25 tier for specific contents) • Development Forum Access
• Your name will be added to the special thanks section of our credits.
• An 11 x 17" Promotional Poster featuring a caricature of you! Created by our senior Illustrator Danielle DiFalco this poster will be team signed and mailed to your house!
• A physical and digital vector art version of a signed personalized logotype of your name by our Designer and Creative Director Justin Novelline. (For personal or commercial use!)

BUG'S BEST TIER:
The Pinnacle Package (See $25 tier for specific contents) • Development Forum Access
• Your name will be added to the special thanks section of our credits as well as put in-game on a grave stone in the "Hero's Graveyard" located in Fallen.

• A team signed 17 x 22" BLEAK Promo Poster (exclusive to only this tier)

• A team signed 11 x 17" Promotional Poster featuring a caricature of you created by our senior Illustrator Danielle DiFalco.

• A physical and vector art version of a signed personalized logotype of your name by our Designer and Creative Director Justin Novelline. (For personal or commercial use!)

SKY'S SOLACE TIER:
• Development Forum Access
• Your name will be added to the special thanks section of our credits as well as put in-game on a grave stone in the "Hero's Graveyard" located in Fallen.
• An invitation to the BLEAK launch party in Boston! (travel/lodging not included)
• You will receive in the mail The BLEAK Tome: 
  x1 Special Edition Boxed Copy of BLEAK for PC.
  x1 Signed Illustrative Edition of the in-game map of Pinnacle.
  x1 Signed Designed Edition of the in-game map of Pinnacle.
  x1 Special Edition Pack of "Scarce" playing cards.
  x1 History of Pinnacle designed/illustrative book.
  x1 Physical Edition (/w liner notes) of the 50+ song Bleak Soundrack by Or Nothing.
  x1 Personal letter of thanks from our creative director Justin Novelline.
  x1 Key to the World - Displaying all the alphabets used by the different races throughout Pinnacle.

ASSOCIATE PRODUCER TIER:
• Development Forum Access
• A celebratory webcam conference call or telephone call with the whole development team upon the successful completion of our kickstarter!
• An Associate Producer credit displayed in both the opening and closing credits of the game!
• An honorary place at the developers table at the BLEAK launch party in Boston (travel/lodging not included).
• The BLEAK Tome (See $1,000 reward tier for specific contents.)
• An interactive NPC character who's name is an anagram of your name will be put in-game and be incorporated in the lore and plot.

PRODUCER TIER:
• Unlimited access to the Tenwall Creatives Development Facebook group.
• A celebratory webcam conference call or telephone call with the whole development team upon the successful completion of our kickstarter!
• A Producer credit displayed in both the opening and closing credits of the game!
• A monthly call from one of us giving you updates on the game!
• We fly you out and give you an honorary place at the BLEAK Launch party in Boston! (Must be in the continental United States, lodging not included)
• The BLEAK Tome. (See $1,000 reward tier for specific contents.)
• An interactive NPC character who's name is an anagram of your name will be put in-game and be incorporated in the lore and plot. You can choose what race they'll be.

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER TIER:
• Unlimited access to the Tenwall Creatives Development Facebook group.
• A celebratory webcam conference call or telephone call with us upon the successful completion of our Kickstarter!
• An Executive Producer credit displayed in both the opening and closing credits of the game!
• A monthly call from one of us giving you updates on the game!
• We fly you out and give you an honorary place at the BLEAK Launch party in Boston! (Must be in the continental United States, lodging not included)
• The BLEAK Tome (See $1,000 reward tier for specific contents.)
+ A statue of you is constructed in the biggest city in the game world "GEAR". According to the game's lore you will be one of the "Origins". (The History of Pinnacle included in the Bleak Tome will include this). When the statue is examined it will explain how in times of great struggle "(Anagram of your name)" prevailed against all odds, rose up, made the impossible possible and saw that dreams came true.
+ A painted portrait of you in front of your in-game statue will be created by our art department, signed by the entire time and presented to you at the launch party!!
